description: This file contains utility functions for handling input validation, including checks for printable characters, IP addresses, URLs, MAC addresses, port numbers, IDs, time ranges, days, SSID names, and string character restrictions. It also initializes the CSRF protection library. The code is aimed at supporting security and validation in a web application related to action handling.

methods.name: printableCharacters
methods.description: Checks if the input string contains only printable ASCII characters within specified ASCII code range, or all printable characters if range not specified.

methods.name: noSpace
methods.description: Checks if the input contains any whitespace characters.

methods.name: validIPAddr
methods.description: Validates whether the input string is a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address.

methods.name: validLink
methods.description: Validates whether the input string is a properly formatted URL per the URL specification.

methods.name: validMAC
methods.description: Validates whether the input string is a valid MAC address, ensuring specific formatting and value constraints.

methods.name: validPort
methods.description: Checks if the port number is within the valid range 1-65535.

methods.name: validId
methods.description: Validates whether the ID is in the range 1-256.

methods.name: validId_PC
methods.description: Validates PC IDs which can be single or range separated by underscore, ensuring they are within 1-256.

methods.name: isValInArray
methods.description: Checks if a value exists within a provided array.

methods.name: isValInRange
methods.description: Checks if a numeric value falls within a specified min and max range.

methods.name: validURL
methods.description: Validates whether the input string is a valid URL, supporting complex URL structures including IPv6 and ports.

methods.name: validTime
methods.description: Validates whether the start time is less than end time, both in 24-hour format, and within valid time ranges.

methods.name: validDays
methods.description: Checks if the provided days string contains only valid day abbreviations.

methods.name: valid_ssid_name
methods.description: Validates SSID name according to specific rules, including length, starting patterns, and reserved names.

methods.name: is_allowed_string
methods.description: Checks if a string does not contain invalid characters such as <, >, &, ', ", |.

methods.name: is_allowed_string_Hostname
methods.description: Checks if a string for hostnames does not contain invalid characters like (, <, >, &, ', $, `, ;, ), |.
